content:
DEPARTMENT OF STATE AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT UNITED STATES AID MISSION TO CHINA
本件保存
MC- 25-7
JUL 27 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang Chief, Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
年
Subject: Excess Auto Parts
Dear Mr. Chang,
Reference is made to our letter MC-166 dated July 18, 1962 and our Purchase Order No. E62-NC-093 dated July 18, 1962. It is our understanding that PWB will be responsible for the pick up and act as the distributor of the subject auto parts.
Will you please furnish us a detailed list of distribution of the subject items. 0.112.213.82
Sincerely yours, A Porter H. T. Potter Supply Advisor
51. 7. 27
14785 V.O.
S.G.
2
CUSA
1 & sip
66
國史饭 Academia Historica
